author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment's 2017 Net Profit Up 36 Pct, Sees Q1 Net Profit Rise
text:
March 25 (Reuters) - Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co Ltd:
* SAYS ITS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 36.46 PERCENT Y/Y AT 609.5 MILLION YUAN ($96.58 million)
* SAYS IT SEES Q1 NET PROFIT UP 55-85 PERCENT Y/Y AT 120-143 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2G2RPkm ; bit.ly/2pEGUCy Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3110 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
